titles: A letter of a gentleman to his friend, shewing that the bishops are not to be judges in Parliament in cases capital
author: Holles, Denzil Holles, Baron, 1599-1680.
notes: Attributed to Denzil Hollis Holles.  Cf. BLC.
Page 119 is torn in filmed copy.  Pages 100-end photographed from Cambridge University Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Parliament. --  House of Lords.
Church of England --  Bishops --  Temporal power.
